languages.text: В руинах ксеносов найдена необычная дурманная субстанция. В тайных алхемис-цехах сырье подвергнется химической очистке и возгонке, обратится в чистую эйфорию, усладу грешных душ тоскующих по новым забавам аристократов.

A curious intoxicating substance has been discovered in xenos ruins. Clandestine Magos Alchemys workshops will refine and distil the substance, transforming it into pure euphoria that will delight the weary souls of aristocrats who long for new diversions.
languages.original_text: В руинах ксеносов найдена необычная дурманная субстанция. В тайных алхемис-цехах сырье подвергнется химической очистке и возгонке, обратится в чистую эйфорию, усладу грешных душ тоскующих по новым забавам аристократов.

traits.locale_text: A curious intoxicating substance has been discovered in xenos ruins. Covert Magos Alchemys workshops will refine and distil the substance, transforming it into pure euphoria that will delight the weary souls of aristocrats who long for new diversions.

A curious intoxicating substance has been discovered in xenos ruins. Clandestine Magos Alchemys workshops will refine and distil the substance, transforming it into pure euphoria that will delight the weary souls of aristocrats who long for new diversions.

languages.text: 炼金贤者在异形的废墟之中找到了某种令人上瘾的物质，在炼金车间中对这种物质进行了提纯。提纯过新型迷酊会为使用者带来纯粹的沉醉与喜悦，令百无聊赖、渴望新的娱乐消遣的贵族欢欣不已。
languages.original_text: A curious intoxicating substance has been discovered in xenos ruins. Clandestine Magos Alchemys workshops will refine and distil the substance, transforming it into pure euphoria that will delight the weary souls of aristocrats who long for new diversions.

traits.locale_text: 炼金贤者在异形的废墟之中找到了某种令人上瘾的物质，在炼金车间中对这种物质进行了提纯。提纯过新型迷酊会为使用者带来纯粹的沉醉与喜悦，令百无聊赖、渴望新的娱乐消遣的贵族欢欣不已。

languages.text: Une étrange substance enivrante a été découverte dans des ruines xénos. Les ateliers clandestins du magos alchemys vont se charger de la raffiner et de la distiller afin de la transformer en euphorie pure qui saura divertir les âmes lasses des aristocrates.
languages.original_text: A curious intoxicating substance has been discovered in xenos ruins. Clandestine Magos Alchemys workshops will refine and distil the substance, transforming it into pure euphoria that will delight the weary souls of aristocrats who long for new diversions.

traits.locale_text: Une étrange substance enivrante a été découverte dans des ruines xénos. Les ateliers clandestins du magos alchemys vont se charger de la raffiner et de la distiller afin de la transformer en euphorie pure qui saura divertir les âmes lasses des aristocrates.

languages.text: Una extraña sustancia intoxicadora ha sido descubierta en ruinas xenos. Unos talleres clandestinos del Magos Alchemys refinarán y destilarán la sustancia para crear euforia pura, deleitando las almas de los aristócratas que ansían nuevos divertimentos.
languages.original_text: A curious intoxicating substance has been discovered in xenos ruins. Clandestine Magos Alchemys workshops will refine and distil the substance, transforming it into pure euphoria that will delight the weary souls of aristocrats who long for new diversions.

traits.locale_text: Una extraña sustancia intoxicadora ha sido descubierta en ruinas xenos. Unos talleres clandestinos del Magos Alchemys refinarán y destilarán la sustancia para crear euforia pura, deleitando las almas de los aristócratas que ansían nuevos divertimentos.

languages.text: 奇妙な中毒物質が、異種族の遺跡で見つかった。秘密組織、錬金魔術団は、この物質を精製・蒸留し、新たな娯楽を求める貴族に純粋な幸福をもたらすだろう。
languages.original_text: A curious intoxicating substance has been discovered in xenos ruins. Clandestine Magos Alchemys workshops will refine and distil the substance, transforming it into pure euphoria that will delight the weary souls of aristocrats who long for new diversions.

traits.locale_text: 奇妙な中毒物質が、異種族の遺跡で見つかった。秘密組織、錬金魔術団は、この物質を精製・蒸留し、新たな娯楽を求める貴族に純粋な幸福をもたらすだろう。

languages.text: In Xenos-Ruinen wurde ein sonderbares Rauschmittel entdeckt. Geheime Werkstätten der Magi Alchemys werden die Substanz veredeln und destillieren und sie in reine Euphorie verwandeln, um den erschöpften Seelen der Aristokraten neue Ablenkung zu verschaffen.
languages.original_text: A curious intoxicating substance has been discovered in xenos ruins. Clandestine Magos Alchemys workshops will refine and distil the substance, transforming it into pure euphoria that will delight the weary souls of aristocrats who long for new diversions.

traits.locale_text: In Xenos-Ruinen wurde ein sonderbares Rauschmittel entdeckt. Geheime Werkstätten der Magi Alchemys werden die Substanz veredeln und destillieren und sie in reine Euphorie verwandeln, um den erschöpften Seelen der Aristokraten neue Ablenkung zu verschaffen.

languages.text: Zeno yıkıntılarında tuhaf bir sarhoş edici madde keşfedildi. Gizli Magos Alşimis atölyeleri bu maddeyi elden geçirip damıtarak aristokratların yeni eğlenceler arayan bıkkın ruhlarını besleyecek saf bir neşe kaynağına çevirecek.
languages.original_text: A curious intoxicating substance has been discovered in xenos ruins. Clandestine Magos Alchemys workshops will refine and distil the substance, transforming it into pure euphoria that will delight the weary souls of aristocrats who long for new diversions.
